body_html:
Thanks Andrehentz for the reply.
Its not slightly different it keeps increasing as i mentioned it started from 0.06 and goes upto 0.86.
To test the scenario and replicate the issue just put the image into somewhere phone memory/SD Card and use the same image to classify the frame.

For example :

String imgPath =  "/storage/emulated/0/DCIM/test.jpg";
 Log.d("Image Path is %s", imgPath);
 Bitmap bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeFile(imgPath);
 Bitmap newbitmap = Bitmap.createScaledBitmap(bitmap, 299, 299, false);
 String textToShow = classifier.classifyFrame(newbitmap);
